snippet.title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Justice | Reveal Trailer (Quest 2 & 3, PS VR2)
snippet.description:
You are a vampire. You strike from the shadows and drink the blood of both mortal and vampire prey. In a gritty main narrative that includes several side missions and dialogue options, explore a dark and mysterious Venice to improve your abilities and become the ultimate arbiter of justice.

Vampire: The Masquerade - Justice is a single player VR Adventure RPG set in the World of Darkness, coming late 2023 to Meta Quest 2 & 3, and PlayStation VR2.

Wishlist today!

🩸Quest 2 & 3: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/6179032068838054/
🩸PS VR2: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10008364

Read more about the game at https://www.vtmjustice.com
